channel.title: Adding models

item.title: Adding models
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

[quote=“Vodzila, post:2, topic:525907”]This happen to me long time ago. I think you have to say in chat “add model (Gz or .dat Number”)
If thats not the solution then i’d find new models[/quote]

I remember seeing something server side that was ::addmodel but even when I tried in game it didn’t come up with model xxx added.

When I added slayer helm or death cape I didn’t have to do addmodel xxx

I’ve tried 2 model for a primal 2h and both don’t work.

It’s wierd though because like I said the when you first log in and te screens black and it says loading please wait, I can seethe item that I’ve added, but when the screens gone the models all wierd.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding models
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

so basically im ripping some models from another 317.
but whenever i add them to mine, the models are all weird.
example.
tormented demon is a wall, haha.

my code

if (i == 3793) { stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[630]; entityDef.readValues(stream); entityDef.actions = new String[5]; entityDef.actions[1] = "Attack"; entityDef.aByte68 = 5; entityDef.name = "corp Beast"; entityDef.combatLevel = 900; entityDef.description = "A beast that eats souls...".getBytes(); entityDef.models = new int[1]; entityDef.models[0] = 4095; }

there

if (paramInt == 3793) { stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[630]; localEntityDef.readValues(stream); localEntityDef.actions = new String[5]; localEntityDef.actions[1] = "Attack"; localEntityDef.aByte68 = 5; localEntityDef.name = "Spirit Beast"; localEntityDef.combatLevel = 900; localEntityDef.description = "A beast that eats souls...".getBytes(); localEntityDef.models = new int[1]; localEntityDef.models[0] = 4095; }

for some reason their corp is named spirit beast

EDIT:

also, when adding items such as ardy cloak or something.
when i log in and i have a black screen saying loading please wait, i can see the ardy cloak model.
but as soon as that black screens gone and i start walking around etc the model goes all funny.
could someone please help?

Read full topic
